analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/27/0xa524828a504da3486b70c7b07eb0a7d3a157ae56.sol:
	Contract WineSpiritCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/27/0xa524828a504da3486b70c7b07eb0a7d3a157ae56.sol#217)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/27/0xa524828a504da3486b70c7b07eb0a7d3a157ae56.sol#87) is not in mixedCase
